blogPost.excerpt: ⭐ Tailwind UI Kit is a one-of-a-kind collection of 600+ ready-to-drop-in components, and 30 templates with react, angular, and vue support.
blogPost.body: ⭐ Tailwind UI Kit is a one-of-a-kind collection of 600+ ready-to-drop-in components, and 30 templates with react, angular, and vue support.
blogPost.title: Tailwind UI Kit - 600+ components, 30 templates, React, Angular, & Vue support
blogPost.author: Arslan Khan

localize.description: ⭐ Tailwind UI Kit是一个集合了600多个现成的组件，以及30个支持react，angular和vue的模板。
⭐ Tailwind UI Kit是一個集合了600多個現成的組件，以及30個支持react，angular和vue的模板。

previous.excerpt: Prize Card™ is a debit card that lets you win money and rewards instantly every time you use it. When you pay using Prize Card™ the merchant (i.e. the store) pays us a small transaction fee which we use to fund giveaways.
previous.title: Prize - Debit card with amazing rewards

localize.description: Prize Card™是一种借记卡，让您每次使用时都能立即赢得金钱和奖励。当您使用Prize Card™付款时，商家（即商店）会向我们支付少量的交易费，我们将其用于资助赠品。
Prize Card™是一種借記卡，讓您每次使用時都能立即贏得金錢和獎勵。當您使用Prize Card™付款時，商家（即商店）會向我們支付少量的交易費，我們將其用於資助贈品。

next.excerpt: Make smarter trades by getting real-time alerts from Contora that are triggered by data from unusual sources — such as Reddit mentions, recent company jobs postings and firings, viral posts on social media, and much more.
next.title: Contora - Better trades with real-time data from unusual sources

localize.description: 通过从Contora获得实时警报，使交易更加智能，这些警报由来自不寻常来源的数据触发--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作岗位发布和解雇、社交媒体上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用来自不同寻常来源的实时数据进行更好的交易

localize.description: 通過從Contora獲得實時警報，使交易更加智能，這些警報由來自不尋常來源的數據觸發--例如Reddit提及、最近的公司工作崗位發佈和解僱、社交媒體上的病毒性帖子等等。
localize.tagline: 利用來自不同尋常來源的實時數據進行更好的交易
